hymn.title: Spring up, well, with water
hymn.category: Fulness of the Spirit—As the Living Water
hymn.chords: | C - F/C - | C - - - | Dm - F - | G7 - C - | C/E - G7/D - | Em - Am - | F - Dm - | G7 - C - |

layout.singingstanza: Spring up, well, with wa -- ter; Dig Thou, Lord, com -- plete -- ly; Dig a -- way all bar -- riers That Thy stream flow through me.

lyrics.stanza: I will dig by praying, Dig the dirt entirely, Thus release the Spirit, Let the stream flow freely.
There's no need again that Christ, the Rock, be riven, But unto the digging That I should be given.
What I need most deeply Is the Spirit's filling, That the living water From my heart be welling.
Dig till there is nothing Left to block the passage; Dig until the stream flows With the living message.
